name: Nightmare
effect: This move only deals damage if the target is Drowsy. Deal 1 Damage to the foe. Until the end of the scene, deal 1 Damage at the beginning of each Round if the target is afflicted with Drowsy. If the target is not Drowsy this move gains -3 Accuracy and is instead treated as a Support move which inflicts the target with Drowsy.
description: The user enters the target's dream to torment it.
